title: Spotify and Android Auto
content:
Pixel 3 being play music(pause not hold) after 5-10 minutes when I disconnected the phone from my Honda Accord 2018 with Android Auto. It does not appear on my previous phones(Honor 8 and Samsung Galaxy S7).
It is very strange, I parked the car(pause is Activated in player), disconnect phone from the car and go somewhere(work, home and etc.) and music On after several minutes.
